in-person.name: Est. Total Student Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows the average between the lower to higher number of student cases listed under "Total" for in-person/hybrid learning. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks average total.

in-person.name: Est. Total Staff Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows the average between the lower to higher number of staff cases listed under "Total" for in-person/hybrid learning. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks average total.

in-person.name: Schools <5 Student Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows a count of how many in-person/hybrid schools have "Fewer than five" or 0 student cases. The number to the right in parentheses is the change from the prior week.

in-person.name: Schools <5 Staff Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows a count of how many in-person/hybrid schools have "Fewer than five" or 0 staff cases. The number to the right in parentheses is the change from the prior week.

in-person.name: New Schools
in-person.source_desc: Shows the total count of new in-person schools that appeared in this weeks table that didn't exist previously. For a full list of the new schools follow this link.

in-person.name: Total Schools
in-person.source_desc: Shows the total count of all schools listed with the type of in-person/hybrid, excluding "Other" and "Total".

in-person.name: % Schools <5 Student Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows the percent of the total count of in-person/hybrid schools that have "Fewer than five" or 0 student cases.

in-person.name: % Schools <5 Staff Cases
in-person.source_desc: Shows the percent of the total count of in-person/hybrid schools that have "Fewer than five" or 0 staff cases.

virtual.name: Est. Total Student Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows the average between the lower to higher number of student cases listed under "Total" for virtual learning. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks average total.

virtual.name: Est. Total Staff Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows the average between the lower to higher number of staff cases listed under "Total" for virtual learning. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks average total.

virtual.name: Schools <5 Student Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows a count of how many virtual schools have "Fewer than five" or 0 student cases. The number to the right in parentheses is the change from the prior week.

virtual.name: Schools <5 Staff Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows a count of how many virtual schools have "Fewer than five" or 0 staff cases. The number to the right in parentheses is the change from the prior week.

virtual.name: New Schools
virtual.source_desc: Shows the total count of new virtual schools that appeared in this weeks table that didn't exist previously. For a full list of the new virtual schools follow this link.

virtual.name: Total Schools
virtual.source_desc: Shows the total count of all schools listed with the type of virtual, excluding "Other" and "Total".

virtual.name: % Schools <5 Student Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows the percent of the total count of virtual schools that have "Fewer than five" or 0 student cases.

virtual.name: % Schools <5 Staff Cases
virtual.source_desc: Shows the percent of the total count of virtual schools that have "Fewer than five" or 0 staff cases.
